value.name: Zend_Gdata
value.description: Class interface to Google Data API's.

value.body:
This is a result of r7577, where errors calling include_once were previously suppressed at Zend_Loader.php:83 and no longer are suppressed.  

Fixed in r8131 - moved the error suppression up one level to the Zend_Gdata_App and Zend_Gdata_Gapps classes which call Zend_Loader to handle the magic data model class creation code in __call.
